welcome.text: I'm a Chatbot that can make easier you searchs in the Web. What are you looking for?

entity.text: Ok. What do you want to find?

Amazon.text: I found SLOT_1 results from Amazon.com. I will show you the first 10 results.

MercadoLibre.text: I found SLOT_1 results from MercadoLibre.com. I will show you the first 10 results.
